body:
Hey Guys so if you read this its true
im leaving Avicus for a long time
i hear every Day iTz_iPVP_ Killaura iTz_iPVP_ Aimbot iTz_iPVP_ AutoClicker
and more of that - because im leaving avicus for a long time 
if i keep hearing that im Raging out the Game 
Like to Much Caps
i got almost get Banned For Rudeness to the Mods

So Guys im Happy To play with you  - vladthegreat - Vacuum - MLGPorky - Numberz_
- RefuseToSink - FrostedCupcakez - FrozenSolstice - Cinammoncroc000
- MidnightDreams - _Taipan - « ғℓυғғℓєρυғғ_ »

Greetz 000Yolo000  aka michaelwouterse
